transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji Lakshman bol raha hun namaskar.

Customer: Yaar suno lead ka kuch samajh mein nahi aa raha.

Executive: Nahi aa raha hai?

Customer: Hmm kab ki sir lead subah aayi thi 1000 kg ki jaise isko humne purchase karne ki koshish ki wo buylead one minute purchase expire ho gayi one minute one second pehle aise bata raha hai.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Aur abhi pura blank aa raha hai usme jabki apna to kafi cities mein apna naam ho gaya hoga.

Executive: Ek minute sir main dekh leta hun.

Customer: Ab dekho yaar isko na.

Executive: Ek minute. Bada aap to jo lena tha to is chhote chhote kam kaise ho gaye.

Executive: Sir 79 city mein ho gaya hai wo.

Executive: To thoda sa try kijiye iske upar 150 se 200 300 kare aur jyada matlab to wo jyada ho jayega.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Matlab jo city aa rahi hai na total jo total city aa rahi hai aapke wo aa rahi hai aapki 79 hai na pura pan India mein. To isko agar 200 plus aur 300 plus karenge na sir aur jyada better aa payega apne paas.

Executive: To uske liye main ek baar guide kar deta hun matlab pehle kiya tha us din maine jo aapko call kiya tha na us din ke upar kiya tha mam ko video meeting se ek baar fir se guide kar deta hun main is cheez ke liye madam ko.

Executive: Waise sir abhi call thodi badi hai sir matlab

Customer: Hai na?

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Ek ko laiye kal bas. Kal ek kal ek ko laiye bas.

Executive: To ho sakta hai kal mam ne uthaya ho sir phone.

Customer: Maine uthaya tha kal ek ko laiye thi maine baat ki thi phone mere paas hi abhi. Mam chutti par hai abhi.

Executive: Achcha dono shadi wadi mein gaye hue hain 15-20 din ke liye.

Customer: Achcha. Wo bhi sab main sambhal raha hun isliye main bola kuch aane jaane mein chakkar kya hai. Haan.

Executive: Sir dekhiye ab kya hai na aapke paas jitni bhi cities hai matlab agar wo kam kam quantity ki bhi leads hai na sir.

Executive: To usko aap consume kariye usse hoga kya ki us city mein na aapka jo leads count ho jayega aur waha pe average sara aapko mil jayega. Sir koi city nahi chhod raha hun main sonu main koi city nahi chhod raha hun sari city le raha hun main. Koi bhi leads normal leads choti leads ho badi leads ho koi si bhi leads ho aap sabko le raha hun main. Sabko le raha hun main sabko le raha hun main.

Executive: Kyunki abhi 79 hi hui hai sir maine socha 200 plus ho gayi hogi.

Executive: Abhi 100 karo okay sir hum log matlab isko karte hain aur jyada consume karte hain sir 200 plus karte hain sir.

Customer: Thoda tum dekho iske andar iske andar leads expire aati hai iske andar expire ho rahi hai aati expire ho rahi hai.

Executive: Achcha.

Customer: Main leads ko sir do maine char maine char device mein khol rakha hai apna IndiaMART ye wala. Achcha achcha achcha achcha sir abhi koi lead nahi dikh rahi na aapko. Ek baar kariye ek baar phone mein phone mein karo. Ek second main abhi kar sakta hun aap karo.

Customer: Haan abhi maine kiya isko open.

Executive: Abhi koi lead dikh rahi hai sir?

Customer: Aa raha hai kuch nahi aa raha hai sir abhi. Kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai?

Executive: Niche niche notify me likha hua hai.

Customer: Niche notify me likha hua hai sir?

Customer: Niche notify me likha hua hai haan us us pe click kariye.

Executive: Aur jitne bhi phones hai na sir aapke teen char jo aap bata rahe hain un sabhi pe ye kariye sir notify me. Usse hoga kya ki jaise abhi aapne bataya na mere ko ki ek lead aayi jaise consume karne ke liye lekin sold out ho gayi hai na to wo cheez na kam ho jayegi matlab aapke paas na aur jaldi wo notification aayega aur taki aap aur jyada jaldi usko consume kar payenge sir. Kyunki char phone hai char phone mein aur jyada matlab ki matlab ki badh jayega aapka jo consumption hai wo.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: To charo phone mein na ye cheez kariye aur din mein na sir matlab ki teen se char baar kariyega aap ye notify me.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Haan aur abhi jo leads hai sir.

Executive: Haan abhi leads nahi hai aapke kaam ki granulars ki hai ye. Bentonite. Notify me jaise isme isme chal raha hai na usme aaram se baki notify me nahi aa raha hai. Fertilizer mein karte hain na sir aap?

Customer: Haan fertilizer mein bhi karte hain na kaam.

Customer: Isme?

Executive: Fertilizer mein bhi kaam karte hain na aap?

Customer: Nahi nahi isme nahi karte isme lekar janam karte hain. Bentonite granulars.

Customer: Nahi nahi isme bhi nahi karte. Isme nahi karte na aap main aapka wahi hai. Theek hai theek hai. To yahi kariye sir teen char phone jitne bhi hai na aapke wahi kariye and sir aapke paas number mera save nahi hai kya sir?

Executive: Theek hai okay sonu sir bolo.

Executive: Aapke paas number save nahi hai kya sir mera?

Customer: Sir nahi mere paas number save nahi tha na tabhi to maine madam ke phone se phone kiya. Achcha achcha achcha nahi sir ye mera personal number hi hai theek hai aap kabhi bhi call karo na isi pe karo kyunki ye pehle customer care pe jati hai fir mere paas wo to main samajh gaya tha lekin main soch raha tha bol raha hun phone bol raha hai isliye maine bola sonu se baat karta hun main nahi karta. Haan haan haan haan haan.

Executive: To yaha pe concern open ho jata hai sir uske liye. To theek hai maine aapko guide kar diya ye teeno charo phone mein kariye sir aur ek na ye concern open ho gaya main usko close kar raha hun ek feedback aayega sir aapke mail pe hai na. To ye mere phone mein to mere phone mein to nahi aaya abhi tak ye jo dusra phone hai na usme to nahi aaya notify me sirf isi mein aa raha hai ek phone mein aa raha hai notify me. Sab mein aayega sab mein aayega sab mein aayega karo aap.

Executive: Open karo main batata hun.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Chalo main karta hun ek baar na fir call deta hun wapas.

Executive: Haan aur ek feedback aayega sir usko de dijiyega please theek hai sir. Wo main kar dunga feedback. Abhi dekhna konsa hai isko yaar. Main main uske liye aap ek baar call back karo mere ko theek hai is cheez ke liye.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai sir theek hai okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not understanding anything about the leads.

- Buylead expired one minute before purchase.

- Showing blank, despite being famous in cities.

- Leads expire quickly.

- Notify me option not showing on all devices.



Resolution:

- Executive checked and confirmed 79 cities covered.

- Advised to target 200-300+ cities for better results.

- Guided to consume even low quantity leads.

- Suggested using 'Notify Me' feature on all devices.

- Explained benefits of using 'Notify Me' on multiple devices.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after checking.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, notify me, cities, leads expire
